definition: country or countryside/native place/home village or town/township (PRC administrative unit)
sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)

sentences.english: She became known as Mother Maybelle, the mother of American country music.
sentences.chinese: 她被稱爲母親梅貝爾，美國鄉村音樂的母親。

sentences.english: The list I've compiled are ten of the best country music debut albums.
sentences.chinese: 我編集的列表是十大頂尖鄉村音樂的最新專輯。

sentences.english: Country music has become big business. It brings in 300 million dollars a year.
sentences.chinese: 鄉村音樂發展成爲一項貿易，每一年盈餘三億美元。

sentences.english: So far, it is still a rural American pop music, music coquettish independence.
sentences.chinese: 至今，它仍在美國流行樂壇上獨領鄉村音樂的風騷。

sentences.english: Why would you admit you listen to country music?
sentences.chinese: 你爲什麼說自己聽鄉村音樂？

sentences.english: On the face of it, this is bizarre really because country music is all about heartache.
sentences.chinese: 表面看，這比較奇怪因爲鄉村音樂是關於頭痛的。

sentences.english: Blues, Country and Soul Mix in Memphis, Tennessee.
sentences.chinese: 藍調，鄉村音樂和靈魂樂融于田納西州，孟菲斯。

sentences.english: It tells real-life stories and sounds the way people really talk.
sentences.chinese: 鄉村音樂以真實的感覺敘述了人們的生活故事和聲音。

sentences.english: My father prefers country-and-western music over every other type.
sentences.chinese: 我父親喜歡西部鄉村音樂勝過其他類型的音樂。

sentences.english: My brothers are wild about country music.
sentences.chinese: 我弟弟們癡迷於鄉村音樂。

sentences.english: He brought together the musical sounds of blacks and country people.
sentences.chinese: 艾爾維斯把黑人音樂和鄉村音樂揉和在一起。

sentences.english: He became a member of the Country Music Hall of Fame in nineteen ninety-four.
sentences.chinese: 他成爲鄉村音樂名人堂一九九四年成員。

sentences.english: What attracts more than just country music fans to Nashville ?
sentences.chinese: 爲何那什維爾不只吸引鄉村音樂迷呢？

sentences.english: He likes all types of music, but 'never got into country.
sentences.chinese: 他說他喜歡風格不同的音樂，但是鄉村音樂就免談了。

sentences.english: After all, Nashville is the undisputed home of country music .
sentences.chinese: 畢竟，納什維爾是無容置疑的鄉村音樂之鄉。

sentences.english: I heard that Nashville is well-known for country music.
sentences.chinese: 我聽說納什維爾的鄉村音樂很有名。

definition: Mao Sui recommends himself (idiom); to offer one's services (in the style of Mao Sui offering his services to king of Chu 楚 of the Warring states)
lit. dragon soaring and tiger leaping (idiom)/fig. prosperous and bustling/vigorous and active
to dress up and make up (like an actor)
